name: Lehi
description: Lehi is one of the central figures in the Book of Mormon. He was a prophet who led his family from Jerusalem to the Americas.

name: Nephi
description: Nephi, Lehi's son, is one of the most prominent prophets. He is known for his leadership, writings, and unwavering faith in God.

name: Jacob
description: Jacob, the younger brother of Nephi, was a prophet who preached to the Nephites and emphasized faith in Christ.

name: Mosiah I
description: King Mosiah I was a righteous king who helped the Nephites in times of turmoil and played a role in the spiritual guidance of his people.

name: Alma the Elder
description: Alma the Elder was a former priest of King Noah who became a prophet and established the Church among the Nephites.

name: Alma the Younger
description: Alma the Younger, initially a rebellious figure, later repented and became a great prophet and leader among the Nephites.

name: Samuel the Lamanite
description: Samuel the Lamanite is a prophet who preached to the Nephites, calling them to repentance. He is well known for his prophecies about the coming of Christ.

name: Mormon
description: Mormon was the prophet who compiled and edited much of the Book of Mormon. He witnessed the destruction of the Nephite civilization.

name: Moroni
description: Moroni, the son of Mormon, was the last prophet in the Book of Mormon. He sealed up the records and buried them before the final destruction of his people.

name: Moses
description: Moses is a central prophet in the Bible, known for leading the Israelites out of Egypt, receiving the Ten Commandments, and guiding the people through the wilderness.

name: Elijah
description: Elijah was a prophet in the Bible known for his confrontation with the prophets of Baal and his ascent to heaven in a whirlwind.

name: Isaiah
description: Isaiah is one of the major prophets in the Bible, known for his prophecies regarding the coming of the Messiah and the future restoration of Israel.

name: Jeremiah
description: Jeremiah was a prophet in the Bible who preached to the Israelites during the destruction of Jerusalem and foretold the coming of a new covenant.

name: Daniel
description: Daniel was a prophet in the Bible who interpreted dreams and visions, and he was known for his faithfulness to God even in the face of danger in Babylon.

name: Ezekiel
description: Ezekiel was a prophet who had a series of powerful visions and prophecies during the Babylonian exile, including the vision of the valley of dry bones.
